citations.narrative:
The kitchen/prep area in the building is cluttered preventing proper cleaning of surfaces and does not protect the food
supplies from threat of contamination. All items shall be stored in a manner that will allow adequate cleaning thereby
minimizing risk of contaminating the food.
Correct by May 19, 2021
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
3.75(e) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
The kitchen/prep area in the building is cluttered preventing  proper cleaning of surfaces and does not protect the food 
supplies from threat of contamination. All items shall be stored in a manner that will allow adequate cleaning thereby 
minimizing risk of contaminating the food. 
 
Correct by May 19, 2021 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End Section
